text:
Reuqest to disable a security alert while trying the HTTPS URL
I am trying to Set up test scripts for our application.
 Here the URL is https which makes a call to another server which is 
http enabled.
Because of this I am getting a security alert whenever a call is 
made from https enabled server to http.

Request to enhance jmeter to diable the security alert for a HTTPS request
creator: myshwetams@yahoo.co.in
sebb@apache.org
text: JMeter now ignores all invalid certificates
